response.original_title: Samantha Hannah: How To Find Happiness (In A Year)
response.overview: In 2018 Samantha, 'one of the funniest ladies on the planet' (RemoteGoat.com), tried to find a husband in a year. It didn't work but she got a ridiculous story out of it (as did The Times, BBC News and of course Perth Courier). It's 2019 now and the hunt is for happiness instead. But what is happiness? And is it really that great?! Come to find out what happened next with the almost hubby... stay for the secrets behind complete and utter fulfillment.  Share this show
response.title: Samantha Hannah: How To Find Happiness (In A Year)
